title: VTOLs
contents: VTOL (Vertical Take-Off and Landing) units are the main aerial instruments in dominating the skies.
To produce VTOL units, you will need to have discovered & researched the "VTOL Propulsion" and "VTOL Factory".
You should also research and build a few "VTOL Rearming Pads", so your VTOL units can reload ammo.
